PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^1----IMPORTANT INFO---- ^0^7 100% REQUIRED GEAR: AWAKENED SPELL CASCADE, LEADERSHIPS PRICE
YOU NEED TO HAVE EQUAL STRENGTH AND INTELLIGENCE FOR LEADERSHIPS PRICE TO WORK
IF YOU DO NOT WANT IT TO BE A NIGHTMARE TO BALANCE STR AND INT, DO NOT GET ATTRIBUTES ON ANY OF YOUR GEAR EXCEPT FOR YOUR BELT IMPLICIT AND THEN FINE TUNE THE IMPLICIT USING BLESSING ORBS / INTRINSIC CATALYSTS
AT LOW LEVELS (72-90) BALANCING YOUR STR AND INT WILL PROBABLY BE ANNOYING BECAUSE OF TRAVEL NODES, BUT IN EASY TIER MAPS YOU SHOULD DO FINE WITH A RARE AMULET INSTEAD OF LEADERSHIPS PRICE FOR JUST GETTING THOSE LEVELS
DO NOT SPEC GLANCING BLOWS WITHOUT A LIFE ON BLOCK SHIELD
60% COLD CONVERSION FROM GLOVES, 40% FROM COLD MASTERY
IF YOUR CAST SPEED IS REALLY BAD EARLY ON YOU MIGHT WANT TO TRY UNLEASH INSTEAD OF SPELL ECHO
Copy the eldritch influenced implicits on the dan gear tab, i am too lazy to transfer all of those to the budget gear section
^x7070FF----Leveling----^7
Level with spark up until level 72 when you can equip awakened spell cascade, then you can swap to reap
^x70FF70----Skill Rotation----^7
Divine Blessing Zealotry -> Cold Snap -> Spam Reap
You want to find the sweet spot for aiming reap to make sure the enemy is being hit by 3 of them instead of just 1 or 2. This can take a bit of practice to master. If the closest reap to you is appearing like it is going behind your character at all, then you are aiming too close to yourself and likely not getting the sweet spot.
You can swap intensify for increased AoE when you are mapping if you want better coverage.
^1HOW TO AIM REAP: ^7https://www.reddit.com/r/pathofexile/comments/vd6ent/complete_guide_to_reap_cascade_overlaps
